lines:
2)

the farthe For instance the 
improvement of Phillips Academy 
during the last two months 
surprising to all the students, 
Another thing the war between 
Italy and Turkey is almost 
a month anda half ald. 
Still another I need not mentis 
amj more that s the terrible 
thing in our country

I can not all you 
how song I am not a 
word from home since 
Cance to Indiana Also 
I do not know what i

going an in Tientain now 9

feel that if I were a flying 
mashin going fine hinde 
wils an hour I would go 
home immdietly to see 
what they are doing at this 
present time

My stubbies are gang 
am pretty well and gaisa 
as good as ever

With best wishes I 
Yours faithfully 
SG Luk
raw: 2) the farthe For instance the improvement of Phillips Academy during the last two months surprising to all the students, Another thing the war between Italy and Turkey is almost a month anda half ald. Still another I need not mentis amj more that s the terrible thing in our country I can not all you how song I am not a word from home since Cance to Indiana Also I do not know what i going an in Tientain now 9 feel that if I were a flying mashin going fine hinde wils an hour I would go home immdietly to see what they are doing at this present time My stubbies are gang am pretty well and gaisa as good as ever With best wishes I Yours faithfully SG Luk

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter thanking Stearns for his compliment on Luk's English. Luk comments on the improvements at Phillips Academy. He comments on the war between Italy and Turkey. He regrets that he has not heard from home and does not know what is happening in Tientsin.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
